opis: Kamena kuća na prodaju, Bol, otok Brač. Bol, najstariji gradić na Braču, sa svojim plažama, od kojih je najpoznatija plaža Zlatni rat, prava je turistička oaza. Kuća se nalazi na izuzetnoj lokaciji ,samo 150m od mora, sastoji se od prizemlja, kata i potkrovlja i ima 173m2,od toga 125m2 stambenog prostora te dvije terase od 25m2i 23m2. U prizemlju se nalazi prostrani atelje, wc, kuhinja, boravak i terasa sa pogledom na more, jugoistočne orijentacije. Iz ateljea se ide na kat gdje su dvije spavaće sobe, kupaonica i stepenište za potkrovlje iz kojeg se izlazi na još jednu terasu, okrenutu na sjeverozapad. Kuća je smještena u mirnom i tihom dijelu Bola, na samo 3 minute hoda do rive, 5 minuta do centra i dvadeset minuta od Zlatnog rata, što je čini idealnom turističkom nekretninom. Ne propustite priliku. Stone house for sale, Bol, island of Brač. Bol, the oldest town on Brač, with its beaches, the most famous of which is the Zlatni Rat beach, is a real tourist oasis. The house is located in an exceptional location, only 150m from the sea, it consists of ground floor, first floor and attic and has 173m2, of which 125m2 of living space and two terraces of 25m2 and 23m2. On the ground floor there is a spacious studio, toilet, kitchen, living room and terrace with a view of the sea, southeast orientation. From the studio, you go to the first floor, where there are two bedrooms, a bathroom and a staircase to the attic, which leads to another terrace, facing northwest. The house is located in a quiet and peaceful part of Bol, just a 3-minute walk to the waterfront, 5 minutes to the center and twenty minutes from Zlatni Rat, which makes it an ideal tourist property. Don't miss the opportunity. .
